heading: Patch 2.2.1 Undocumented Changes / Findings
content: Patch 2.2.1 is live for a few days now! Here are some undocumented changes and findings our Maxroll Team made and is sharing with you! Are you enjoying and making your way through Season 8: Belial's Return? On top of Season 8 Compendium Update, our team is hard at work polishing and updating the build guides for Season 8: Belial's Return with all our discoveries. Keep an eye out for new and updated resources in the next few days and weeks! With that said, head over to our to stay up to date with our content development and to make the most of your Season 8 experience! Also don't forget to check out our Written by:
